review: When I got this binder, I noticed the covering was "plastic" and rigid, not rubbery and giving, so I figured that's why -- right out of the box -- the binder had cracked in a 1-inch spot on the underneath edge seam. I shrugged, not willing to write this binder off yet. But now, after only a couple of uses, I'm noticing another spot that's also cracked. The material does not flex, so it cracks easily. If it wasn't for the poor quality of the covering, I would rate this 5 stars based on the "one touch" mechanism of the metal rings and its quality. Disappointed that more care wasn't taken to give this "heavy-duty" binder true durability.
productTitle: Avery Heavy-Duty Binder with 2-Inch One Touch EZD Ring, Blue (79882)
